definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be advantageous, proper, suitable, succeed, late Aram. (NH id.; Aram. [[כְּשָׁר]], k4ap);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[וְכָשֵׁר הַדָּבָר לִפְנֵי הַמֶּלֶח]] Es 8:5 and the thing be proper in the view of the king; Impf. [[יִכְשָׁר֨]] Ec 11:6 thou knowest not whether this shall succeed, or this.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Inf. cstr. [[וְיִתְרוֹן הַכְשֵׁיר חָכְמָה]] Ec 10:10 an advantage for giving success is wisdom.
